item.description:
High Tide at Portsmouth Harbor - 8:59 pm

Low Tide at Portsmouth Harbor - 2:33 pm

Join us for a scenic paddle from the Pierce Island boat launch and up the Sagamore River, where we will stop and watch the Boston - Portsmouth Air Show at Pease Tradeport. The Navy's Blue Angels are featured this year and are flying at 3:00 pm.

The Tides are not great for this event, we will be paddling with the tide for much of this paddle, But we will be against the tide while going up the Sagamore River.

This is a Level 2  paddle open to Kayaks of at least 12 feet long with watertight bulk heads. Expect strong currents, wind, waves, and boat wakes.  As always, PFD's (Life Jackets) are required when paddling with this group.

Note: There is a $5 launch fee at Pierce Island.

Click Here For Google Maps Directions To Pierce Island
item.name: Boston - Portsmouth Air Show / Sagamore River Paddle
